properties.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Eastern Franklin; Northwest Middlesex County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 10:26AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
A brief period of snow overspreads the northern Worcester Hills
by midday. Any snow accumulations will be rather light, generally
a coating to 1 inch. The snow may change to a brief period of
sleet and freezing rain during the afternoon before changing to
all rain by late afternoon.

While any snow and ice amounts will be very minor, untreated roads
may become slippery this afternoon, especially at elevations near
and above 1000 feet. Motorists planning travel in this region
should be prepared for slippery travel and allow extra time to
reach their destination.

NWSheadline: AREAS OF SLIPPERY TRAVEL POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON ACROSS THE NORTHERN WORCESTER HILLS
